item.title: Seven & I 接触零售、超市单位的买家
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Seven & i Holdings Co.公司已就其伊藤洋华堂商店和超市与潜在买家进行了接触，以寻求重组，应对加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. has approached potential buyers for its Ito-Yokado stores and supermarkets as it seeks to restructure in the face of a takeover approach from Canada’s Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc., people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 印度投资者创下 "逢低买入 "新纪录
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国科技股缺乏空头回补意味着反弹是新鲜买盘
item.description: 自中国宣布经济刺激计划以来，中国科技股大幅上扬。而这一次，它可能是真的。【原文：Chinese tech stocks have had a tremendous rally since the nation announced its stimulus spree. And this time, it may be real.】

item.title: 香港中国股市攀升，交易员评估动能
item.description: 由于交易员们在评估 16 年来最大涨势的可持续性，香港中国股市在上午的交易中震荡走高。【原文：Chinese stocks in Hong Kong edged higher in a volatile morning session as traders assessed the sustainability of the biggest rally in 16 years.】

item.title: 韩国电视剧巨头 CJ 每年斥资 7.5 亿美元对抗好莱坞
item.description: 韩国最大的娱乐公司 CJ ENM Co. 计划每年在内容方面投入 1 万亿韩元（约合 7.5 亿美元），以更好地与好莱坞竞争，并使其业务摆脱困境。【原文：CJ ENM Co. plans to spend 1 trillion won ($750 million) annually on content, as South Korea’s largest entertainment company tries to better compete with Hollywood and pull its business out of a funk.】

item.title: 美国码头工人暂停罢工后亚洲航运股下跌
item.description: 美国东海岸和海湾沿岸港口的码头工人同意暂停罢工，抑制了集装箱运价因供应减少而上涨的预期，亚洲各地的航运股因此下滑。【原文：Shipping stocks across Asia slumped after dockworkers at US East and Gulf coast ports agreed to suspend their strike, curbing expectations container rates will increase due to reduced supply.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司因社交媒体罚款与澳大利亚打官司败诉
item.description: 澳大利亚一名法官驳回了社交媒体平台 X 公司试图抹去监管机构处以的 61.05 万澳元（41.81 万美元）罚款的请求，这是该国在与全球互联网公司的斗争中取得的一个显著胜利。【原文：An Australian judge rejected an attempt by social media platform X to wipe a A$610,500 ($418,100) fine levied by a watchdog, a notable victory in the country’s battle with global internet companies.】

item.title: 日本央行导致日元债券收益率下滑，伯克希尔向市场发出日元债券的声音
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. has started sounding out investors for its second yen bond deal this year, at a time when expectations for the Bank of Japan raising interest rates again soon have receded.】

item.title: 精神航空公司努力达成拯救协议以避免破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）为重组债务和避免申请破产所做的努力遇到了阻碍，因为该公司与债券持有人进行了数月的谈判，但未能达成协议。【原文：Spirit Airlines’ efforts to restructure its debt and avoid filing for bankruptcy have hit a snag after months of talks with bondholders failed to result in a deal, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。中东紧张局势加剧，石油价格飙升。汇丰银行取消活动以降低成本。据报道，Shein 正在评估潜在的伦敦 IPO 前的兴趣。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Oil surges as Middle East tensions rise. HSBC cancels events to curtail costs. Shein reportedly is gauging interest ahead of a potential London IPO. Here’s what’s moving markets. —Isabelle Lee】

item.title: Citadel 将亚洲基本面股票部门的员工人数增至 60 人以上
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Citadel 价值 640 亿美元的对冲基金业务在短短三年多的时间里已将其亚洲基本面股票部门的员工人数增加到 60 多人。【原文：Citadel’s $64 billion hedge fund business has increased its Asia fundamental equities headcount to more than 60 people in just over three years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管进行了改革，日本仍有更多股票以低于账面价值的价格交易
item.description: 尽管企业改革备受投资者赞誉，但越来越多的日本股票交易价格低于账面价值，这表明管理者需要采取更大胆的方法来推动股东财富的增长。【原文：An increasing number of Japanese stocks are trading below book value despite corporate reforms that have attracted investor praise, suggesting managers need a bolder approach to drive shareholder wealth.】

item.title: 印尼钢铁市场困境使克拉卡陶公司重组复杂化
item.description: 印尼克拉卡陶钢铁公司（PT Krakatau Steel）试图重组 15 亿美元贷款的努力正将焦点转向使重组过程复杂化的运营和行业困境。【原文：Indonesian steelmaker PT Krakatau Steel’s attempt to restructure $1.5 billion of loans is turning the spotlight on operational and industry woes that complicate the process.】

item.title: 中国现金基金急于重返股市，损失数十亿美元
item.description: 就在数十亿美元流向追踪股票的交易所交易基金的同时，数十亿美元退出了中国最大的货币市场交易所交易基金，这表明中国政府终于将持怀疑态度的投资者吸引回了中国苦苦挣扎的股市。【原文：Billions of dollars have exited China’s largest money market exchange-traded funds just as billions more flowed into ETFs tracking equities, signaling that Beijing has finally drawn skeptical investors back to the country’s struggling stock market.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势引发石油飙升，美国就业前景不明：市场综述
item.description: 在周五晚些时候将公布的美国就业数据有助于确定未来的利率走向之前，中东的紧张局势令投资者感到不安，石油和美元因此上涨。【原文：Oil and the dollar rose as tensions in the Middle East unnerved investors ahead of US jobs data due later Friday that will help identify the path ahead for interest rates.】

item.title: 因担忧以色列可能将伊朗原油作为打击目标，原油涨幅扩大
item.description: 由于担心以色列可能会打击伊朗的原油设施，以报复本周早些时候的导弹袭击，原油大幅走高，创下近一年来的最大涨幅。【原文：Oil pushed higher — following its biggest jump in almost a year — on concern that Israel may strike Iranian crude facilities in retaliation for a missile barrage earlier this week.】

item.title: 思科接近以 230 亿美元估值投资 CoreWeave
item.description: 据知情人士透露，思科系统公司（Cisco Systems Inc.【原文：Cisco Systems Inc. agreed to invest in CoreWeave, a cloud-computing provider that’s among the hottest startups in artificial intelligence, as part of a transaction that values the company at $23 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德、卡尼成为保守派议员攻击的目标
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）和马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）已成为加拿大保守党一名成员的目标，该成员希望加拿大游说监督机构对他们进行调查。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management and Mark Carney have been targeted by a member of Canada’s Conservative Party who wants Canada’s lobbying watchdog to investigate them.】

item.title: 拉吉夫-詹恩对席卷全球的中国股市狂热不以为然
item.description: 随着中国政府的刺激政策掀起史诗般的涨势，全球投资者都在抢购中国股票。拉吉夫-詹恩（Rajiv Jain）可不在其中。【原文：Investors across the globe are rushing to scoop up Chinese stocks as Beijing’s stimulus blitz sets off an epic rally. Just don’t count Rajiv Jain among them.】

item.title: OpenAI 的支持者科斯拉（Khosla）表示，向人工智能投资数万亿美元是合理的
item.description:

item.title: 埃克森石油公司因石油和炼油利润率下降导致盈利减少 16 亿美元
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.）称，油价和炼油利润的下降使其第三季度盈利比上年同期减少了 16 亿美元。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. said lower oil prices and refining margins reduced third-quarter earnings by $1.6 billion compared with the previous period.】

item.title: 高盛新秀难以跻身对冲基金精英行列
item.description:
艾斯勒资本公司（Eisler Capital）最近遇到的困难表明，要想在对冲基金行业的顶级会议上占有一席之地是多么困难。【原文：

Eisler Capital’s recent difficulties show just how tough it is to grab a seat at the hedge fund industry’s top table. 

】

item.title: 桑坦德银行支持的 Ebury 据称将启动伦敦 IPO 投资者谈判
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，由桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）支持的英国支付集团 Ebury 正开始为在伦敦的首次公开募股寻找潜在投资者，这家西班牙银行及其创始人正在继续权衡企业的各种选择。【原文：Banco Santander SA-backed British payments group Ebury is starting to sound out potential investors for an initial public offering in London, according to a person familiar with the matter, as the Spanish bank and its founders continue to weigh options for the business.】

item.title: Blackstone 刺探到私人信贷中的 "30 万亿美元商机
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 预计，在基础设施项目贷款和养老基金更多参与的推动下，私人信贷市场规模将膨胀至 30 万亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. expects the private credit market to balloon to $30 trillion in size, fueled by lending for infrastructure projects and greater participation from pension funds.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔石油公司称发现的天然气可满足哥伦比亚 80% 的需求
item.description: 哥伦比亚 Ecopetrol SA 公司首席执行官里卡多-罗亚（Ricardo Roa）表示，该公司发现了一个海上天然气矿藏，日产量可能高达 8 亿立方英尺。【原文：Colombia’s Ecopetrol SA discovered an offshore natural gas deposit that could potentially produce up to 800 million cubic feet of gas a day, according to Chief Executive Officer Ricardo Roa.】

item.title: 野村警告：中国股市繁荣可能在2015年转为萧条
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Investors should brace for the biggest stock rally in China in 16 years to turn to bust, with the economy on a much weaker footing than before the pandemic, said Nomura Holdings Inc.】

item.title: 大谷经济促进了章鱼烧连锁店和求职网站的发展
item.description: 让开，泰勒-斯威夫特。棒球明星大谷翔平的经济实力给日本企业界带来了一些大赢家，也带来了一些输家。【原文：Move over, Taylor Swift. The economic might of baseball star Shohei Ohtani is bringing some big winners, and also some losers to the Japanese corporate world.】

item.title: 港口罢工最新消息：好市多购物者大量购买卫生纸
item.description: 周二，码头工人与码头运营商和航运公司之间的劳动合同到期，从休斯顿到迈阿密再到波士顿的美国集装箱港口已关闭第三天。【原文：US container ports from Houston to Miami and up to Boston are closed for a third day after the labor contract between dockworkers and terminal operators and shipping lines expired Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将为利率制定委员会增添第二位局外人
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）宣布了重组加拿大央行治理结构的计划，在其主要决策机构中增加了第二位局外人，扩大了参与制定利率的官员人数。【原文：Governor Tiff Macklem announced plans to reorganize the Bank of Canada’s governance structure by adding a second outsider to its main policy-making body, expanding the number of officials involved in setting interest rates.】

item.title: 南非玉米出口预测上调至 190 万吨
item.description: 南非农业商会将该国截至 2025 年 4 月的玉米出口量预测上调至 190 万吨。【原文：South Africa’s Agricultural Business Chamber has raised its forecast for the country’s corn exports for the year ending April 2025 to 1.9 million tons.】
